name: The Manager (itch)
description:
I RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE GAME TO BE ABLE TO SAVE + THE DOWNLOAD VERSION WORKS BETTER AND HAS LESS LAG.

Have you ever dreamt of being an underpaid overworked supermarket employee ?

You're in luck, in The manager you can do everything you would normally do working a job like this, such as :

- Looking through trash for money.

- Shoplifting.

- Joining a cult.

- Beating up old people.

- Steal your boss's personal informations.

- And much more!

all the assets are just pic i found on google image, the music is some royalty free music and some track i composed myself. I hope you have fun playing this game, don't hesitate to give me some feedback i d appreciate it hehe ^^

(i was supposed to make a trailer and shit but i really can't stand my voice so i couldn't do it lmao.)
